articles.title: 10 More European Gas Buyers Open Ruble Accounts for Payments - NDTV
articles.description: Ten more European gas buyers have opened accounts in Gazprombank JSC, doubling the total number of clients preparing to pay in rubles for Russian gas as President Vladimir Putin demanded.
articles.content:
Gazprom PJSC halted gas flows to Poland and Bulgaria in late April after they refused to pay in ruble..
